price: 100. Il n’est donné à aucune âme de croire sans la permission d’Allah, Qui sévit terriblement contre ceux qui ne se rendent pas à la raison.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayajʿalu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
